title: Commercial buildings are empty but still require maintenance - The Globe and Mail
description: Commercial buildings are empty but still require maintenance  The Globe and Mail
content:
John Butler is a property maintenance supervisor for WTC1 Inc., which manages more than 200,000 square feet of commercial space in Waterloo, Ont.
Ian Stewart
Property manager John Butler is one of many on the front lines caring for commercial buildings sudd… [+6827 chars]
